casebody.data:
No. 10-7371. Lester Joe Perry, Petitioner v. Rick Thaler, Director, Texas Department of Criminal Justice, Correctional Institutions Division. 562 U.S. 1281, 131 S. Ct. 1628,

179 L. Ed. 2d 520,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 2061. March 7, 2011.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 562 U.S. 1152, 131 S. Ct. 939, 178 L. Ed. 2d 779, 2011 U.S. LEXIS 458.
